header.title: XHTML Serializer
header.abstract: This document describes the XHTML serializer of Cocoon.

s1.title: XHTML Serializer
s1.p: The XHTML serializer serializes sax events to XHTML. The output of the XHTML serializer is XHTML.

s2.title: Sitemap Configuration
s2.p: The XHTML serializer is declared in the sitemap serializers section.
s2.source: <map:serializers ... ... <map:serializer name="xhtml" src="org.apache.cocoon.serialization.XMLSerializer" mime-type="text/html" logger="sitemap.serializer.xhtml" pool-grow="2" pool-max="64" pool-min="2" > <doctype-public>-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN</doctype-public> <doctype-system>http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd</doctype-system> <encoding>UTF-8</encoding> </map:serializer> ...
s2.p: The declaration of the XHTML serializer shall use following XML serializer configuration parameters

tr.td: specifies the XHTML public document type
specifies the XHTML system document type
specifies mime-type of the serialized XHTML document.
